main.se450.singletons

Class ConfigurationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.se450.singletons.ConfigurationManager

  • public class ConfigurationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The singleton Class ConfigurationManager handles and manages all the accesses to the configuration.

    • Method Summary

      • setConfiguration

        public final void setConfiguration(int framesPerSecond,
                                   int repeatKeySpeed,
                                   int width,
                                   int height,
                                   int shapes,
                                   int shipWidth,
                                   int shipHeight,
                                   float shotSpeed,
                                   float shotDiameter,
                                   int shotLifetime,
                                   float forwardThrust,
                                   float reverseThrust,
                                   float friction,
                                   float leftRight,
                                   java.awt.Color color,
                                   IStrategy borders,
                                   int lives,
                                   int shields)
        Set the current configuration with parameters.
        Parameters:
        framesPerSecond - The number of frames per second, representing the overall game speed.
        repeatKeySpeed - The repeat key speed of the keyboard repeat rate.
        width - The width of the main window.
        height - The height of the main window.
        shapes - The number of shapes will be initialized at the beginning.
        shipWidth - The width of the player ship.
        shipHeight - The height of the player ship.
        shotSpeed - The speed at which a shot will travel.
        shotDiameter - The diameter of the player ship shots.
        shotLifetime - The amount of frames a shot will last.
        forwardThrust - The amount of forward thrust generated by each tap.
        reverseThrust - The amount of reverse thrust generated by each tap.
        friction - The speed at which the ship slows.
        leftRight - The amount at which the player ship rotates.
        color - The ship's color.
        borders - The border strategy of the player ship.
        lives - The initial number of lives a player has.
        shields - The initial number of available shields a player has.
